data.system_settings: iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 1 & iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3
data.actual_result: Search is very unresponsive and needs long time to load the results. Also you can't close it while loading the results. The bug especially happens with the iPad version.
data.expected_result: Search should run smoothly and allow to instantly close it.
data.short_description: Find or start a conversation search is unresponsive and has massive lag when using it
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your DMs - Click on the`Find or start a conversation` search there - Try to search for something (better to use only 1 or 2 letter with much results) and observe how the results appear - Also try to close the search while results are still loading
